line.text: Mine eye and heart are at a mortal war
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: How to divide the conquest of thy sight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Mine eye my heart thy picture sight would bar
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My heart mine eye the freedom of that right
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My heart doth plead that thou in him dost lie
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: (A closet never pierced with crystal eyes)
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But the defendant doth that plea deny
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And says in him thy fair appearance lies
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To side this title is impanelled
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: A quest of thoughts all tenants to the heart
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And by their verdict is determined
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The clear eye moiety and the dear heart part
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As thus mine eye due is thy outward part
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And my heart right thy inward love of heart
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
